backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the IASA Challenge platform, defining data types (UserProfile, Project, Task, Pledge, Vote, Challenge, PeerRating) and CRUD/action functions with access control and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old actor state (OldUserProfile without gamification fields) to the new schema (NewUserProfile with totalEnablerPoints, efficiencyBadgesCount, constructivenessRating) during canister upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that ProfileSetupModal.tsx and useQueries.ts were updated to pass the selected SquadRole variant when calling registerUser, with high confidence and linked to test REQ-6.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON file containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files for build planning and documentation purposes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, setting the page title to 'IASA Challenge (Alpha Sandbox) v0.3' and mounting the app at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that wraps the app with ThemeProvider, QueryClientProvider, and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering MainApp and a Toaster notification component.
frontend/src/components/CompleteProjectB: Button component that allows project creators to mark a project as completed, triggering the peer rating window via the useCompleteProject mutation.
frontend/src/components/CreateProjectDia: Dialog form component for creating new projects with fields for title, description, estimated HH, monetary value, and optional resource link, with input validation before submission.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Dialog form for creating tasks within a project, validating the HH budget against the remaining project budget calculated from existing tasks.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard component displaying user scorecards (earned HH, reputation, enabler points) and a tabbed project list filtered by status (all, pledging, active, completed) with a create project button.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component showing copyright, a caffeine.ai attribution link, and the app version string.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with the IASA logo, app title, and a user dropdown menu showing squad role, earned HH, reputation, and voting power with a logout option.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Unauthenticated landing page with a feature grid (rewards, collaboration, progress, quality) and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/MainApp.tsx: Root app shell that handles initialization, authentication state, and conditionally renders LoginScreen, the Dashboard layout, or the ProfileSetupModal when a profile is missing.
frontend/src/components/PeerRatingSectio: Component for submitting 0â€“5 star peer ratings on a project, listing other participants in a select and displaying existing ratings, with mentor ratings carrying 3x weight.
frontend/src/components/PledgeSection.ts: Component that lets users pledge Human Hours to a pledging-status project and displays a list of all current pledges with participant details.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that collects a username and squad role from new users and registers them via the useRegisterUser mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ProjectCard.tsx: Displays a summary card for a single project showing status, prize money, payout per HH, and participant count, with a button to open the full ProjectDetailsDialog.
frontend/src/components/ProjectDetailsDi: A full-screen dialog showing detailed project info including stats, pledge progress, and tabbed sections for pledging, tasks, peer ratings, and pool share.
frontend/src/components/ProjectsTab.tsx: Renders a responsive grid of ProjectCard components for a list of projects, or an empty-state message if none exist.
frontend/src/components/ShareOfPoolSecti: Calculates and displays each participant's projected monetary payout based on their share of completed-task Human Hours relative to the total pool.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Displays a single task card with status badge, HH budget, and context-sensitive action buttons (accept, complete, approve, challenge) based on the current user's role.
frontend/src/components/TasksSection.tsx: Lists all tasks for a project using TaskCard components and conditionally renders CreateTaskDialog and CompleteProjectButton controls for creators and participants.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using the current Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks (queries and mutations) for interacting with the ICP backend actor, covering user profiles, projects, tasks, pledges, and peer ratings.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extends border radius and animations, and registers typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the build state of the 'IASA Challenge Sandbox' ICP/Motoko DAO platform, listing architectural notes, existing features, and a 4-step incremental feature roadmap with pending items.
